alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:17PM PST until January 08 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT PST FRIDAY NIGHT ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. West to southwest winds gusting as high 45 to 55 mph Friday. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From noon Friday to midnight PST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
